title: LF Team Challenger mid Placed Top 3 in last split OCS
body:
IGN Btka
Age: 21

Experience: Abyss Esports, Alpha Sydney, Above average, playing in ool and ocs for 2 years.
Currently rank challenger on 350 points.

I am looking for a team in the ocs/opl. Just coming off of placing 3rd in OCS with the team alpha sydney as their main mid. I am available 24/7 and willing to trial. 

Add my IGN for more details or for any offers

replies.body: I am currently lurking and seeking out people ~ I currently have one very skilled player. I have added you in game to discuss this futher, I will try to be on all day so that you are able to reach me.
Hey man can u add me in game and we will talk ty :)
